title: Shout out to a player that was extremely optimistic!
body:
Thank you **PhoenixOfHeaven** for playing league of legends with me and bringing your great Vibes. You were extremely optimistic in game and friendly! Thanks so much! <3 
http://imgur.com/DWZpfx5
http://imgur.com/tZCoWgq
http://imgur.com/QykAdhx

**Comment and Like to bring awareness that league of legends still have good players :) Give players shout outs in the comments. JUST DO IT! - SHIA**

Edit:
_**Can we get someone from riot to do a shout out for something they are thankful for. :P **_{{champion:32}} 

**Wow! This hit the front page of boards thanks so much guys for the likes! <3 Have a great day! :D I'm speechless at all the nice players commenting.  Thank you so much. Enjoy PhoenixOfHeaven. Loving this community. 
**
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/d0/d017cb3b1528cc2aedc8a5ef2c3fb1b14d93374860f0d46f1d7cf76712952bcb.jpg

Shout out to Riot Axes and Fizz Enthusiast for being latest riot comments in front page of boards!
http://i.imgur.com/PcgRTlP.png
http://i.imgur.com/0BYtHT8.png

Shout out to Riot PhillyBrew for being an amazing and epic friend! Thank you for mystery gifting me like couple months ago! **YOU ROCK! **
http://i.imgur.com/gpb3YHt.png

replies.body: Hope you have a great day Phoenix! There is still some really great people who is level 30! :D

One of the best matches I ever played! The come back was insane.

And now for an advertisement. I know there are players here who gave up on LoL. The community to toxic. The game too unbalanced. Join me for a match sometime. Believe me, it'll change your entire perspective towards this game. A optimistic team changes everything.

**Hey you seem like a cool person. Add me Phoenix! :D **
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
:P I'm Online now, so sure thing. Not playing any more matches for today, sadly. But perhaps tomorrow, or Tuesday. I'd be eager to play some of the new rotation.
Currently offline right now.  {{champion:74}}  Might be on sometime.

Again, Another time. We'll eventually find a time. And if you don't mind, before we do I'd love to know ya a little more, and not in he stalkery way :P I like to know who i'm playing with. Don't worry, wont ask anything personnel.
not in NA feelsbadman
I would love to game with ye :p but im a 100% solo que player xD also muteall is great cause i can just listen to some opera and play

'muteall' ? And Yep, Open to joining you for a match whenever ya want. If you like Solo queue, then i'll just go Jungle. Pretend i'm not there :P That, and I tend to carry as Sejuani Jungle. So win win, I guess?

Ye, i just mute all my teammates and enemies. I get distracted super easily so once someone starts typing in game... i just fall apart xD 
And feel free to add me whenever :P though i am a Support main which is funny
Nothing wrong with being a support main. I'm not the best of ADC's, but if you want someone to adc for ya I could do it.
Honestly, I rarely ever lose lane in solo que because my adc;s are either incompetent and just play back, or GODS and i get them fed and laugh happily :3

:P I like support mains. They are very considerate for other people. And they launch some hilariously nasty insults at their adc's.

Yep. Support is all about how your laner plays.
Well i am the exception then xD I play Thresh, Leo, and Brand. Needless to say, I don't like having my enemy laner be alive :) xD
Sounds fun! I could use a nice relaxing game for a change.
Sure thing! I'll add ya whenever I get the chance in game. And Yeah, Perhaps Unfounded, the one who made the post, may join up too.
...How'd we manage to get 40 upvotes? I've never made a post that got this many. And even more heart-warming it was one like this.

I'm bored.

http://img.memecdn.com/in-the-life-of-teemo_o_5157221.jpg

Shout out to all the wonderful players who play this game! Laughing fish is funny :0 I want to see him post. Give me a meme laughing fish :) {{champion:105}} 

I guess I just gave Laughing fish a shout out XD.
http://i.gifntext.com/49911-well-here-i-am.gif

OMG LAUGHING FISH! <3 NOW WE NEED MALICIOUS METAL !!!!

https://media0.giphy.com/media/PfHrNe1cSKAjC/giphy.gif 

<3 <3 <3

I'll be completely honest? I idolize Malicious :P He's someone who proved the game was more then a game to him, and is willing to get super devoted to the lore. That is something I like to see.

Edit- As for Laughing. Whenever I see him post, I wonder where his hoard is..... Just imagine all those pictures or gif he's got hoarded up on imgur or something.
I asked him and he says google
Hey now, I'm just really enjoying Mordekaiser, that's all :)
idk if this guy is sarcastic or just an extremely kind person its the internet  I CANT TELL

It would be funny if the OP posts tomorrow in M&G
"hehe xd jk"
and shown the rest of the chat to be very toxic and sarcastic.
Otherwise, seems like a friendly fellow.
http://s2.quickmeme.com/img/45/451ab8e56df6f66c37c7eda8e36765f743cbabf1e1dbee5dffd648f47dde54d1.jpg
No Señor Unfounded Titan. Perdóname.
Lol
lol I got a good kick out of this :P Posts like these I wish I could upvote several times.
And i'm here, stating it was kindness.
Glad people like this still exist here!
Same <3 Feel free to add me! I'm looking for kind and friendly players. **Also shoutout for replay system 2017! :D**

Sent!
Hopefully you have a low enough MMR to play with me XD

Nah, people just act nice to use you until you are no longer necessary. Happens in real life, happens in game. As soon as you don't appease them, they just turn toxic.

If not, they're hypocritical white knights.

That's a very grey way to look at life.

Judging from the black background, I think this is the post-game chat, meaning that PhoenixOfHeaven was not obligated to say nice words, but did so anyway.

It's taken out of context, from both the other chat post-game and the in-game chat. 

Basically, it's not being nice just for the sake of being nice. No one can ever do that, and it's impossible to do. Just the way things are. There's a reason for the niceness, and that's what makes the praise meaningless.

I wouldn't say it's impossible, I'd say it's not rewarded enough. Morale is something you get from looking at the best, not pointing out the worst. It also has a crowd mentality aspect to it; why should I be nice when no one else will?

That's the main idea about being that kind of person. You act nice *because* no one else will, you don't ask for praise, you don't ask for thanks, you just hope it helps someone. This world is full of assholes, you don't need to be one yourself because of it.

Yes, but it's done not because "no one else will", but rather because of something you want. In the cases we praise the most, it's to try to obtain some sort of moral high ground, or to make yourself feel better. No one's nice on a whim, everyone's an asshole, and will only do "moral behavior" for their own personal reasons.

Just the way things are.

There are no "nice people", but it's more of a culmination of nice acts done by various people all across the world. 

The "nice guy" is the same as the "perfect guy", physically nonexistant, but a representation of many things.
Your name fits your comments, but please don't drag the mood of everybody else down.

Yes, it was Post-game chat. I was Malphite support, complimenting our team after every lane fed hard. And I did it out of a mix of sheer happieness in our team, and how surprised I was we turned it around.

IT'S THE LEGEND HIMSELF
how do you feel being a feature in this post?
THANK YOU PHOENIX FOR BEING AWESOME, WE NEED MORE PEOPLE LIKE YOU!
INDEED! We do need more people like him.

Shout out to all the people I just played with recently! They all were super friendly! <3 THANKS FOR THE EPIC GAME! 
http://i.imgur.com/hK7uapo.png
:D This is gonna be a fun batch, aint it?
Shoutout to the Xin Zhao and Orianna about half a year ago, who literally gave up their own lives (executed) to give me an early Rift Herald. What a sacrifice! What teamwork!
Two people dying trying to do rift herald XD
Amazing strat.
